001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.allure;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.client.DbClient;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.client.DbClientManager;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config.DatabaseConfiguration;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.connector.BaseDbConnectorService;
007import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
008
009/**
010 * Specialized {@code DbClientManager} implementation for Allure reporting.
011 *
012 * <p>This class extends {@link DbClientManager} and overrides the client initialization
013 * to integrate with Allure, enabling enhanced logging and reporting for database interactions.
014 *
015 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
016 */
017@Component
018public class AllureDbClientManager extends DbClientManager {
019
020   /**
021    * Constructs an {@code AllureDbClientManager} with the specified database connector.
022    *
023    * @param connector The {@link BaseDbConnectorService} responsible for establishing database connections.
024    */
025   public AllureDbClientManager(final BaseDbConnectorService connector) {
026      super(connector);
027   }
028
029   /**
030    * Initializes an {@code Allure}-enhanced database client.
031    *
032    * <p>This method overrides the default client initialization to provide
033    * enhanced request and response logging using Allure reports.
034    *
035    * @param dbConfig The configuration used to initialize the client.
036    * @return A {@link DbClient} instance enhanced with Allure logging.
037    */
038   @Override
039   protected DbClient initializeDbClient(final DatabaseConfiguration dbConfig) {
040      return new RelationalDbClientAllure(getConnector(), dbConfig);
041   }
042}
